评论概述: Beautiful! But not entirely as described
评论详情: I love it! But sadly I took off two stars because:  1. The chain was so think it could break at any moment if not handled well.  2. It wasn’t nickel or lead free as described. I have allergy to fake jewelry that is not metal. I started developing a rash and had to stop using it for a while.

I got this (along with a couple of others) to try for my wedding because I wanted something with a little bit of sparkle, but nothing crazy (and, frankly, didn't want to spend a ton of money). I ended up liking the silver version better, but would still recommend the gold to anyone who prefers gold!  It comes in a cute little jewelry box (nice if you want to gift it), and the gold chain seems sturdy, and the adjustable portion at the end fits a variety of lengths. The gems are relatively sparkly without being obnoxious.  So all in all, a great affordable option, and something that's not so flashy you could easily dress it up or down :)

评论概述: Love it, pretty, dainty and elegant
评论详情: I am absolutely in love with this necklace is dainty and delicate, making it perfect for layering with other necklaces or wearing on its own. The gold plating is of high quality and has not tarnished or faded even after several weeks of wear.  The cubic zirconia solitaire pendant is simply stunning, with a square cut and emerald green and white simulated diamonds that sparkle beautifully in the light. The pendant is the perfect size, not too big or too small, and sits perfectly on the collarbone.  The necklace also comes with an adjustable chain, which is a great feature for those who prefer a longer or shorter length. The clasp is easy to use and secure, ensuring that the necklace stays in place throughout the day.  Overall, dainty and elegant piece of jewelry that is perfect for both casual and formal occasions. It also makes a great gift for a loved one or friend!
